name: Set.mem_iff_boolIndicator
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
s : Set α
x : α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem s x) (Eq (s.boolIndicator x) Bool.true)
decl:
theorem mem_iff_boolIndicator (x : α) : x ∈ s ↔ s.boolIndicator x = true := by
  unfold boolIndicator
  split_ifs with h <;> simp [h]

name: Set.not_mem_iff_boolIndicator
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
s : Set α
x : α
⊢ Iff (Not (Membership.mem s x)) (Eq (s.boolIndicator x) Bool.false)
decl:
theorem not_mem_iff_boolIndicator (x : α) : x ∉ s ↔ s.boolIndicator x = false := by
  unfold boolIndicator
  split_ifs with h <;> simp [h]

name: Set.preimage_boolIndicator_true
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
s : Set α
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage s.boolIndicator (Singleton.singleton Bool.true)) s
decl:
theorem preimage_boolIndicator_true : s.boolIndicator ⁻¹' {true} = s :=
  ext fun x ↦ (s.mem_iff_boolIndicator x).symm

name: Set.preimage_boolIndicator_false
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
s : Set α
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage s.boolIndicator (Singleton.singleton Bool.false)) (HasCompl.compl s)
decl:
theorem preimage_boolIndicator_false : s.boolIndicator ⁻¹' {false} = sᶜ :=
  ext fun x ↦ (s.not_mem_iff_boolIndicator x).symm

name: Set.preimage_boolIndicator_eq_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
s : Set α
t : Set Bool
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage s.boolIndicator t) (Union.union (ite (Membership.mem t Bool.true) s EmptyCollection.emptyCollection) (ite (Membership.mem t Bool.false) (HasCompl.compl s) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection))
decl:
open scoped Classical in
theorem preimage_boolIndicator_eq_union (t : Set Bool) :
    s.boolIndicator ⁻¹' t = (if true ∈ t then s else ∅) ∪ if false ∈ t then sᶜ else ∅ := by
  ext x
  simp only [boolIndicator, mem_preimage]
  split_ifs <;> simp [*]

name: Set.preimage_boolIndicator
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
s : Set α
t : Set Bool
⊢ Or (Eq (Set.preimage s.boolIndicator t) Set.univ) (Or (Eq (Set.preimage s.boolIndicator t) s) (Or (Eq (Set.preimage s.boolIndicator t) (HasCompl.compl s)) (Eq (Set.preimage s.boolIndicator t) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection)))
decl:
theorem preimage_boolIndicator (t : Set Bool) :
    s.boolIndicator ⁻¹' t = univ ∨
      s.boolIndicator ⁻¹' t = s ∨ s.boolIndicator ⁻¹' t = sᶜ ∨ s.boolIndicator ⁻¹' t = ∅ := by
  simp only [preimage_boolIndicator_eq_union]
  split_ifs <;> simp [s.union_compl_self]
